# EditionInitializer variable

**Signature:**

  name: "TokenERC1155";
  contractType: "edition";
  schema: {
    deploy: import("zod").ZodObject<

        import("zod").extendShape<

    address: string,
    provider: ethers.providers.Provider,
    storage: ThirdwebStorage,

    Promise<
      | {

              outputs?: undefined;

                      type: string;
